problem_text_cn: 如图,PA和PB是⊙O的切线,点A和B是切点,点C是⁀{AB}上的点,连接AC、BC,若∠P=70°,则∠ACB的大小是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are the tangents of O, points A and B are the tangent points, and point C is the point on ⁀AB. Connect AC and BC, if ∠P = N_0, then the size of ∠ACB is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OA,OB,∵PA,PB分别为圆O的切线,∴∠OAP=∠OBP=90°,∵∠P=70°,∴∠AOB=110°,即大角∠AOB=360°-110°=250°,则∠ACB=\frac{1}{2}大角∠AOB=125°．故选:C．
raw_comment: 此题考查了切线的性质,四边形的内角和定理,以及圆周角定理,熟练掌握切线的性质是解本题的关键．
